titles.title: Providing for a committee of two Members to be appointed by the House to inform the President.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/15/2000--Introduced. Provides for a committee of two Members appointed by the House to join a similar committee appointed by the Senate and inform the President of the United States that the two Houses have completed their business of the session and are ready to adjourn.
